name: Kidz Sports: International Soccer
overview: This is your chance to be the sporting hero you’ve always dreamed of! Take control of your team and battle against your opposition in some of the wackiest games of 11-a-side action ever! Kidz Sports – International Football is a fun based sports game, which will have you standing up, moving around and literally re-enacting the movement of the game you’re playing. Using your Wii Remote and Nunchuk, you can dribble your way through the competition, earn skill points and pull off crazy super moves to really defeat your opponents in style! Steer your team to triumph in the Knockout Cup, or enter Exhibition Mode to get straight into the action. The choice is yours! The highly successful Kidz Sports range is designed to allow the player to intuitively understand the control system. This delivers an unprecedented “pick-up-and-play” gameplay experience. Have you got the skills to take your team to the top of the league? Will you be lifting the trophies? See if you have what it takes in Kidz Sports - International Football.
